TextView.android:text: 1 Brief Forms Here are nine more brief forms for very common words.
2 Rd The combination rd is represented by writing the r with an upward turn at the finish
3 Ld The combination ld is represented by writing the l with an upward turn at the finish.
4 Been in Phrases The word been is represented by b after have, has, had.
5 Able in Phrases The word able is represented by a after be or been.
